rawDescription: The character can absorb the power of the Elements, including {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, and then based on the element absorbed, gain the skills {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>$[S66013]</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>$[S66023]</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>$[S66033]</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>$[S66043]</color>. (The character can only have one Elemental Type absorbed at once, and this status will record the Elemental Type previously absorbed)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character absorbs an element of a different type than the currently absorbed element:</color> Generate 1 Elemental Die of the same type as the Element that was just absorbed.
description:
The character can absorb the power of the Elements, including Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro, and then based on the element absorbed, gain the skills Frostspike Wave/Torrential Rebuke/Blazing Rebuke/Thunderstorm Wave. (The character can only have one Elemental Type absorbed at once, and this status will record the Elemental Type previously absorbed)
After this character absorbs an element of a different type than the currently absorbed element: Generate 1 Elemental Die of the same type as the Element that was just absorbed.

name: Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization

description: After this character takes Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro DMG: If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs Elemental Absorption.

name: Stone Facets: Elemental Summoning
rawDescription:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Based on the Elemental Type already absorbed by this character, absorb a different Elemental Type.
If no Elemental Type has been absorbed yet or {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>.
If {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>.
If {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.
If {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color> is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>.
description:
End Phase: Based on the Elemental Type already absorbed by this character, absorb a different Elemental Type.
If no Elemental Type has been absorbed yet or Electro is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of Hydro.
If Hydro is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of Cryo.
If Cryo is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of Pyro.
If Pyro is the currently absorbed element, then absorb the power of Electro.
